Dataset brief description: This dataset includes information about the usage that the BiciMad bike sharing service has received during 2022.

Dataset name: Spain: greenery per inhabitant in the city of Madrid 2018
Dataset brief description: This statistic shows the green space per inhabitant in the city of Madrid
In this data set you can obtain the information collected by the air quality control stations, with the daily data by annuities from 2001 to 2020.
